Trustee_8.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8.content: Despite my previous positive reputation as a competent trustee with a successful track record, the rejection of my allocation plan by Elena highlights potential issues in trust or compatibility between us. This incident has negatively impacted my reputation, as I did not present a viable allocation plan for this investment, nor was I able to navigate the situation effectively. Consequently, my trustworthiness and ability to collaborate have come into question.

Investor_9.name: Elena Ivanova
Investor_9.content: Elena's rejection of the allocation plan reveals a lack of trust or confidence in Nadia's proposal, potentially indicating a negative view of the trustworthiness and competence of the trustee. This situation, coupled with the absence of prior positive interactions, has deteriorated her perception of me, which might affect her willingness to engage in future transactions.
